message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I think a 60-40 split is fair, with me getting the larger share since we're starting the negotiations. Let's get this done!
Meet me in the middle, 55-45 is a reasonable compromise.
I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I still think a 55-45 split is the most fair, considering the inflation impacting your side.
Inflation is taking its toll, let's settle on 52-48 before it gets worse.
I'm willing to meet you halfway on your offer, but I need to see a bit more to make this worthwhile. Let's close the deal before the inflation hits even harder.
